project.name: Reading Aid for Dyslexic People
project.description: AI-powered reading aid that extracts text from PDFs/images, simplifies complex language, and provides text-to-speech functionality

pipeline.step1: OCR Extraction - Extract text from PDF or image files
pipeline.step2: Text Simplification - Use T5/BART models to simplify complex text
pipeline.step3: Text-to-Speech - Convert simplified text to audio
